theProdigy:UnrulySpark.NAME: Unruly Spark
theProdigy:UnrulySpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !theProdigy:M2! times. NL [MP_Icon] : !M! additional time.
theProdigy:UnrulySpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !theProdigy:M2! times. NL [MP_Icon] : !M! additional times.

theProdigy:PlasmaCutter.NAME: Plasma Cutter
theProdigy:PlasmaCutter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !theProdigy:M2! times. NL [MP_Icon] : Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theProdigy:Gust.NAME: Gust
theProdigy:Gust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !theProdigy:M2! card at random.
theProdigy:Gust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !theProdigy:M2! card.
